comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Parker Quintet played at the Deuces from August 7– 20, 1947. In this period the Gillespie Orchestra played at the Downbeat Club, as shown on the photo, which also shows Savannah Churchill at the Onyx. 
(“Slam Stewart and Yardbird Parker Put 52nd Street Back in the Swing Groove,” Chicago Defender, August 16, 1947, 10).
 (“Where The Bands Are Playing,” Down Beat, August 13, 1947: 17). 

Consequently the right dating of the photo should be "August 1947."
